definition: to send/to assign/to appoint/servants of an official/official messenger
official post/billet/commission/CL:件[jian4]/see also 差事[chai1 shi5]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Do you want a better job?
sentences.chinese: 你想找份更好的差使吗？

sentences.english: It was absolute hell trying to get this report finished on time.
sentences.chinese: 要准时完成这份报告可真是苦差使。

sentences.english: Eg: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore.
sentences.chinese: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使。

sentences.english: For large primary coma aberration, interference fringe presents.
sentences.chinese: 大的初级彗差使焦平面出现干涉条纹。

sentences.english: In the winter of more than two years ago, grandma died and father lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 那年冬天，祖母死了，父亲的差使也交卸了。

sentences.english: I was deputed for the unpleasant task.
sentences.chinese: 这个讨厌的差使交给了我。

sentences.english: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore .
sentences.chinese: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使。

sentences.english: I also bear witness that Muhammad is the faithful Servant and Messenger of Allah.
sentences.chinese: 我又作证穆罕默德是衪的忠仆，也是衪的差使。

sentences.english: The Prince of Darkness does not condescend to such cheap drudgery.
sentences.chinese: 这种下贱的差使，根本用不着劳“黑暗之王”的大驾。

sentences.english: A small job as janitor of a dance hall helped him for a month.
sentences.chinese: 在一家舞厅干一份看门的小差使帮他度过了一个月。

sentences.english: She had little ability, but she was able to get a good job by trading on her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 她没什么本事，但会利用自己的美貌得到一份好差使。

sentences.english: It's certainly the first time I've had an assignment of that kind.
sentences.chinese: 我干这样的差使确实也是破题儿第一遭。

sentences.english: Worse, she became increasingly frustrated with the tedium of running errands.
sentences.chinese: 更糟的是，随着跑差使的枯燥，她变得越来越失落。

sentences.english: The soldier evaded hazardous by malingering.
sentences.chinese: 这个士兵装病逃避危险的差使。

sentences.english: Need to think creatively about car pooling and combining errands
sentences.chinese: 需要创造性地考虑汽车共乘和联合差使。

sentences.english: Serve for inside oblation in the tribunal becomes intimate with bad make of, is still us of human.
sentences.chinese: 担任内廷供奉亲近差使的，还是咱们的人。

definition: hard task/difficult mission/arduous and unrewarding undertaking/drudgery/grind/chore
to order (sb) around/to send on an errand/to order away
to hand over to a successor/to relinquish one's office
